type.description: Hide the name of the users who have passed the quiz in the results

anonymizeAttempts.description: Hide the name of the users who have passed the quiz in the results

interruptible.description: Is it possible to stop the quiz and continue it later ?

duration.description: The allowed duration to pass the quiz

maxAttempts.description: The number of times a user can pass the quiz. If 0, there is no limit

randomOrder.description: Randomize order of steps in the quiz

randomPick.description: Pick a random sub set of steps in the quiz

pick.description: Number of steps to use when a user pass the quiz. If 0, all the steps are used

showOverview.description: Show overview to users or directly start the quiz if false

showEndPage.description: Display an end page when the user has finished the quiz

showMetadata.description: Display detail information about the exercise

showStatistics.description: Display statistics about what users have answered

showFullCorrection.description: Display the full correction with expected answers

showCorrectionAt.description: The point at which users can view the correction of their attempt to the quiz

showScoreAt.description: The point at which users can view the score of their attempt to the quiz

showFeedback.description: Display immediate feedback about his answer to the user
